name: Dwarf Dispenser
behaviour: The '''Dwarf Dispenser''' will summon [[Dwarf Henchman|dwarf henchmen]] incredibly fast. Contrary to previous belief, these do not cause damage themselves. Historically it was possible to die to one of these, and presumably that was due to their summons' hits being counted as their own damage. The energy damage received in the same room is from [[Magicthrower]]s on the west of the room. The '''Dwarf Dispenser''' won't chase you, due to its inability to move.
location: Behind the sealed door near [[Talphion]] in [[Kazordoon]]. In Technomancers' Laboratory.
strategy: Get away from these as fast as you can.
